column5: Hi all,I fished the premier's this August, and finished somewhere in the middle with 10 pounds for 5 fish.I was wondering if anyone else here fished it. If so, what was the hot technique, and what section of the river did you fish?We fished white rock with live bait rigs and leeches, 7 foot snells, the whole time.Also, does anyone know what the hot technique/location was at the Vanity?Thanks, good fishin'!Jack
